attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy cards attached to Flaaffy in order to use this attack. Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards you discarded. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Electric Current
attacks.effect: Take 1 Energy card attached to Flaaffy and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you have no Benched Pokémon, discard that Energy card.
